reviews.text: Great station but I found a lost hamster running around the station. 😭

Nice station but where’s the toilets arrived 10 mins before train was due sat crossed legged waiting for the train to use the toilet and add to wait in line nice upgrade but don’t you think toilets would have been high up the line

Lady in the cafe was very rude, so cold and windy outside and I had flowers with me so decided to seek shelter for 10 minutes in the cafe just to ensure they wouldn’t fall over and get damaged. Might be a rule that you shouldn’t use it for a waiting area however considering there was no one there except for me and another gentleman she could have allowed it, or could have been A LOT more polite.
3rd day on the trot and there are commuters smoking and vaping on the platform. No staff members around to deal with. Very poor.
Trains always late and nearly always deathtrap Pacers. Northern Rails forgotten line.
